documents.document: @T_A_Gurit @chhopsky @overwatchleague I think ultimately youâ€™d end up with it all on MLG, but from a business perspective Iâ€™d like to see numbers where thereâ€™s little room for manufacturing them.
@Siignal @overwatchleague No that seems fair. Iâ€™d like to see a reason to watch outside twitch though - Iâ€™d love to be watching on my 52â€ 4K tv right now but no MLG app that Iâ€™m aware of
@Siignal @overwatchleague You mean test broadcast platform features or in-game overlays etc? If the former that makes sense.
@chhopsky @overwatchleague Iâ€™m talking dynamic stat overlays, select your own camera etc. Heck, Iâ€™d pay for that functionality on games Iâ€™m into.

@chhopsky @overwatchleague True that, but interested to see if platform migration really works. Iâ€™m more curious because you donâ€™t see viewership stats on their owned platform. That said, if the https://t.co/L2xM6Tq33Z platform brings unique functionality then Iâ€™m all for watching there.
Why is the @overwatchleague not on Twitch? Surprised theyâ€™d shut that market off considering the significant promotion theyâ€™d get.

@JaydaBF @realDonaldTrump The ethnic, cultural and religious diversity we see within Esports (both players and fans) is a thing of beauty. Improve the gender situation and weâ€™re onto something even more incredible.

Absolutely zero tolerance for the rubbish @JaydaBF spouts and @realDonaldTrump endorses. These are not commonly held views in Britain. Iâ€™m proud to be part of a culturally and religiously diverse country. Thatâ€™s what makes us great.
